name: Hero Runner
description:
Are you looking for flying games or runner games? That's your lucky day!

You are a superhero now! Try to avoid crash with the blocks.
This game will train your reflex and your focus on tasks.
Game for the whole family.
The best endless runner game ever!
Check yourself and check your friends!
Free forever!
Enjoy hours of fun with your superhero.

How to play?
- Change hero direction by swiping up and down
- Enable turbo mode clicking in the screen
- Try to connect this two options in many ways to get different styles of flight

Hero Runner - Endless fun with superhero run features:
- Get achievements and fight with your friends 💪
- Try to be the best in the leadersboard! 💪
- Flying games or runner games? We have both of it in one amazing game! 💪
- Powerful music 💪

Please, install Google Play Games if you want to join our leaderboard.
